settings.testimonial: It was such a simple and smooth process. The customer service was a 10/10. They were so helpful and willing to work with us in order to create a ring my fianc√© and I both really loved
settings.author: Alyssa & Vincent

settings.testimonial: I loved working with Stienhardt. Excited to add our wedding bands to my finger in a few months!
settings.author: Taylor & Hunter

settings.testimonial: This was one of the best experiences. The customer service here is impeccable. They got back to me immediately and I had a beautiful diamond ring custom made for me in 2 weeks.
settings.author: Natalie & Hunter

settings.testimonial: Celebrated our 20 year anniversary with new rings. I always wanted an art deco floral motif ring and my husband's ring needed to be resized. So, I had Stienhardt & Stones custom make my new ring in platinum. They did a beautiful job with all the milgrain work and customized my husbands ring with a comfort fit band.
settings.author: Stephanie Awe

settings.testimonial: Absolutely blown away with my experience at Stienhardt & Stones! Justin was so helpful in finding me the perfect diamond - I had originally ordered from another online retailer and was disappointed when the stone looked different than the online pictures and videos. I returned it and reached out to Justin at Stienhardt & Stones and he went out of his way to take videos of 3 different stones for me so I could choose the best one. Highly recommend!!!
settings.author: Arbita S

settings.title: Don't Take From Us - Here's what our customers Have To Say

settings.heading: Created By Us. For You.
settings.description: Our skilled gemologists and diamond cutters carefully examine each diamond before it reaches you, guaranteeing exceptional quality and clarity throughout the entire process.
